## Task 1:

- take a dataset of your choice i.e. from https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/index.php or elsewhere which is suited for regression or classification.  Then, build a data pipeline which:

- performs hyperparameter tuning
- uses [xgboost on spark](https://github.com/rstudio/sparkxgb) as the classifier or regressor
- log the results into mlFlow
- serve the model as a restful API using mleap

- recommend next best action / next purchase
